trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event is raised when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>时选择按钮将引发事件 (与按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Select") 单击后，之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理选择操作。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，如取消所选内容的操作，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler>委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler>委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。
